item.description:
This is a cozy neighborhood bar that closes at Midnight (required by Providence zoning). There is street parking if you can battle the snow mounds. It's next door to Duck&Bunny and a few doors down from Wickenden Pub. You can order food from United BBQ (with a discount) or if you get the munchies run over to a nearby restaurant for takeout and eat in the bar.

I will probably be there until 11, but won't be hopping.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for our pictures and we'll try to carve out a corner
item.why: Feeling a little stir-crazy and stuck inside? How about a casual night on the town with new friends? Mix & Mingle at Abe's. They were so nice to open up for us to have our holiday party, we should go back. It's a cozy neighborhood bar on Wickenden.
item.name: Mix & Mingle
